column2: "Quit beating around the bush, Echo. We don't have time for you to stare at your shoes and mumble here."

"That Matoi girl turned into the [Profound Darkness] and vanished. That's what happened.
Right, <%me>?"
"Z-Zeno! I was trying to be tactful!"
"It's fine. If <%me> was the type to get depressed just from people restating facts, we wouldn't be here right now."
"It's clear what you need to do. No time for looking back now. You understand that, don't you?"
"That's what I thought. You really are just like Teacher. As for me, my path is clear too..."
"You're going to say seniors should help their juniors, aren't you?"
"You're on the Council of Six now. Shouldn't you wait for Command to decide where they want you to go?"
"I wouldn't know anything about that. All I know is, my job is to help my juniors. You with me, Echo?"
"...Well, if I leave you two alone, you'll only go and get yourselves in trouble."
"And more importantly, I owe a lot to <%me>."

"Works for me.
OK, <%me>.
The next move is up to you."
"No matter what happens, we've got your back."
